btrultima.join.message: §bWelcome %1$s! §fIf you're seeing this is because you have §1BTRUltima §fdownloaded. §6If you have any §equestions §6or §asuggestions, §bjoin our §1Discord Server
btrultima.race.mystical_beast.notes: §dFairy §cTales... §3you've heard of them, §4haven't you? §1But the §eextraordinary §1isn't as §9impossible §1as it seems. §8After all, §7you're part of it too.. §faren't you?
btrultima.skill.ability.awake: §bWelcome back §8Master§b! §9I have taken care of things while you were out.
btrultima.skill.ability.dismiss: §bI understand. §9I apologize if I have been a nuisance for you to require my §8Dismissal.
btrultima.skill.analyst.description: §dAnalyze your enemies in prol of your §ballies§d. Able to move faster than the §7average §3being§d, casting powerful §3magics §einstantly§d.
btrultima.skill.azathoth.description: §dBecom'st the §5Void §dthyself. Absorb the §5Universe §dwith your power without moving, almost like you're §5asleep. §dNo one shall wake you from your §5slumber, §0Azathoth.
btrultima.skill.azazel.description: §0The Fallen One§4, even when being the one §0below§4, nothing escapes it's control. §0Fall §4into §6temptation §4while §0Azazel §1arises§4.
btrultima.skill.azrael.description: §4A being of §fjudgment and fate, §0Azrael§4 carries the weight of §0endings. §4With a §0blade §4carved from §9sorrow §4and §0wings §4draped in §atwilight, §4he delivers §emercy §4or §cdestruction §4with unerring precision. §cSouls §4are drawn to him for their §ffinal §4reckoning.
btrultima.skill.beelzebuth.description: §dBecome one with Hunger itself. Allowing you to absorb targets like a §0Black Hole §dwhile also stealing their abilities and power. §7Or maybe.. §cYou're hungry for §4Souls...
btrultima.skill.blockage.description: §1Blocks both §0spatial §1and §fenergy §1from every target in the radius of 30 blocks.
btrultima.skill.carnation.description: §cCarnation the flower of §fGod §cblooms with boundless §avitality§c, but.. you're not a §fGod§c, are you? No.. §5You're far superior, you're craving a world §freborn.
btrultima.skill.chaos_creator.descriptio: §4Chaos, §7the very essence of this world… §fwhich binds thee, and to which thou art bound. §cThy power is without limit, §6thy life, unending. §5Ever shall it burn, §8silent beneath all things.
btrultima.skill.chaos_ruler.description: §6Bend §freality §6until it breaks.. §eRule §6the §4chaos that lies beyond comprehension. §6Command the §cforces of distortion, domination, and madness. §6Tear through 3barriers§6, shatter the §1laws of §0space §1and §9time §6and consume the §fessence §6of others to §cgrow §6ever stronger. But beware—when §4chaos §6answers, §cit never lets go.
btrultima.skill.cursed_poison.descriptio: §6Wield the §apoison §6not just to §cwound, §6but to §ebind a link §6that §ainfects §6both §cflesh and fate, §6as if §4love itself §6turned §2toxic..
btrultima.skill.death_angel.description: §0The final blessing—and the final blow. §fThe §fDeath §fAngel §0offers peace or purging, their wings cloaked in §fvirtue §0and §4sacrifice§f. To meet them is to face your fate.
btrultima.skill.determination.descriptio: §4Stand strong where others fall. §cFueled by loss, purpose, and hope§4, your will alone rewrites §7fate. §fWhen all else fades, you remain—filled with §4Determination.
btrultima.skill.hope.description: §eEven in the bleakest times, you shine. §fHarness the latent power in others, amplify their §elight§f, and guide them forward. §eHope §fisn’t just a feeling—it’s a force, and it’s §ayours.
btrultima.skill.investigator.description: §6Tapping into the §5Wisdom §6of the §dUniverse, §6you gain the ability to instantly §banalyze §6your §asurroundings. §6With this §1power, §6you uncover §8secrets §7hidden §6in plain sight, seeing things others miss. No detail is too §asmall—everything §6is part of the §fgrand §bdesign.
btrultima.skill.manufacturer.description: §7Fuse and §atransmute §6any §bskills §6into their §bbetter forms§6, almost like §fsharpening §6a §7blade §6against the hard §firon §6of an §7anvil§6.
btrultima.skill.mode.azazel.temptation_w: §4Welcome to another §fReality§4, where only §6temptation §4remains. §eGood luck§4, §myou have %s minutes.
§4Time has ended. You're still here!? §mThat's.. interesting. §eCongrats§4.

§eYou were able to §asave §eyour §aally §ein time. This fills you with §cDetermination!
§c%s §ehas §4died. §eBut you still have a chance to §asave §eyour §aally!
btrultima.skill.raphael.description: §9Become one with Knowledge itself. §fAllowing you to be faster than your opponents can predict, smarter than everyone or even able to §1unlock everything in your path.
btrultima.skill.sanguine_covenant.descri: §5Harness the ancient §4and taboo §cart of blood manipulation §5to dominate the battlefield. §4§lThe Sanguine Covenant §4grants access to §cdevastating techniques §7that imprison foes, §csever their life force, §5store forbidden power, §8and unleash a soul-crushing aura §0of void and §2decay.
btrultima.skill.seeker.description: §8Seek your enemies in prol of your §ballies§8. They may try to escape, but you're §9wiser§8.

btrultima.skill.spacetime_domination.des: §dDominate the §5cosmos §dwithin your own desires, control the §1spacetime itself §dto your §fwill. §5Time flow §bfreezes §5entirely at your §8command.
btrultima.skill.spacetime_manipulation.d: §dWield the §5cosmic §dthreads of existence, bending the fabric of §1spacetime §dto your §fwill. §5Time flow §bfreezes §5entirely at your §8command, §fmy child.
btrultima.skill.tailed_beast.description: §6Harness the §4terrifying §9power §6of the Tailed §cBeast, §6unleashing §4devastating§6 attacks that strike §7fear §6into your §cenemies. §6The more §9power §6you obtain, the more you become the §fmighty creature itself, §6gaining an §cunstoppable §6status.
btrultima.skill.tempter.description: §cIn a §fWorld §cwhere §6Temptation §crules, only the strong will remain. §1Do not worry, in this §fReality§1, you're in §0control.
btrultima.skill.time_domination.descript: §dHave time in your hands, most beings like to enjoy life as much they possibly can. But you? You have no §5Time Stop.
btrultima.skill.time_letter.description: §fEveryone has something they'd §8desire §fto say or do in the past, some long on those lost §9memories§f, while some §8wish §fthey'd have more §8time §fto create enough of them.
btrultima.skill.time_manipulation.descri: §dEver wondered what it is like to manipulate time with your own desires? Most would think it's impossible, but you, §fmy child§d, you have the power to §5Stop Time.
btrultima.skill.timeless_memories.descri: §fDid you knew that, §bMemories §fare §bTimeless§f? §7Some §cdearer §7than others, some §4less. §8But all of them hold a place into your §fbeing§8, §bgood §for §cbad.
btrultima.skill.true_demon_lord.descript: §eAscend into §4tyranny §eand transcend §fmortality. §eA §5True Demon Lord §ebends §csouls§e, devours §finnocence§e, and spreads §7fear that shatters §fmorality. §eRule not with §cmercy, §ebut with §0power born of §4chaos.
btrultima.skill.true_hero.description: §aAwaken the light within the chosen. §fWith unshakable resolve and unmatched courage, §aTrue Heroes §frally against fate itself, reviving allies and leading them beyond their limits. §eLegends live through you.
btrultima.skill.ultimate_indolence.descr: §fFall §binto eternal sleep §fand §0eat everything around §fas you rule the §bindolence §fand §0glutton. §1No one shall test the §bwaters §1from where your §0power §freigns.
